TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputLanguageManager extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
Public NotInheritable Class InputLanguageManager Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 提供在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中管理輸入語言的功能。

span.span: Provides facilities for managing input languages in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 [地區及語言選項] 控制面板，可以註冊其他語言。Additional languages can be registered by using the Regional and Language Options control panel. 從 [語言] 索引標籤中，選取 [文字服務及輸入的語言]，然後按一下 [詳細資料] 按鈕向其他語言。From the Languages tab, select "Text Services and input languages", then click the "Details" button to register additional languages. 下列對話方塊隨即出現。The following dialog appears. ![文字服務和輸入語言對話方塊。](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "文字服務和輸入語言 對話方塊。")![Text services and input languages dialog.](~/add/media/tsf-dialog.PNG "Text services and input languages dialog.") ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用若要設定的輸入的語言項目。The following example demonstrates how to use an to set the input language of a element. [!code-csharp[languageManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/languageManager/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[languageManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/languageManager/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得目前可用輸入語言的列舉值。

span.span: Gets an enumerator for currently available input languages.

value.span: 列舉值目前可用的輸入語言，或**null**如果沒有指定輸入的語言可供使用。

span.span: An enumerator for currently available input languages, or **null** if no input languages are available.
This property has no default value.

summary.span: 取得或設定目前的輸入語言。

span.span: Gets or sets the current input language.

span.span: A object representing the currently selected input language.

value.span: 這個屬性可能不會設定為**null**。

span.span: This property may not be set to **null**.
The default value is .

summary.span: 取得或設定關聯相依性物件的慣用輸入語言。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred input language for the associated dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| 當相關聯的相依性物件收到輸入的焦點時，會自動選取這個附加的屬性所指定的輸入的語言。When the associated dependency object receives the input focus, the input language specified by this attached property is selected automatically.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示當關聯的相依性物件失去輸入焦點時，是否應還原上一個作用中輸入語言。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether or not the previously active input language should be restored when the associated dependency object looses the input focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| 如果這個屬性就不會影響附加的屬性並不適用於相關聯的相依性物件。This property has no effect if the attached property is not available on the associated dependency object.
